name: PayPal
highlights: Building full stack web applications with React and GraphQL to acquire PayPal Credit customers
Designed a micro-frontend integration for loading the PayPal Credit sign-up flow within PayPal Checkout
Migrated the legacy PayPal Credit sign-up flow to a modern React and GraphQL stack
Designed and led an initiative to support browser environments that had cookies disabled, resulting in +300 new PayPal Credit customers per day
Collaborated with mobile teams to design GraphQL schemas
Supported E2E testing teams for multiple successful feature launches
